AdServer.brief: version 2.0.0.0 configuration for default-values-colo colocation released at 2012-07-03 15:32:54

Service.name: keyscan-Scanner
Service.keyscan_hosts: HostName4 HostName5 HostName6 HostName7 HostName8 HostName9 HostName1 HostName2 HostName10 HostName11 HostName12 HostName13 HostName14

Service.name: fe1-UserInfoChecker
Service.start_cmd: export PERL5LIB=$PERL5LIB:/opt/foros/server/manager/default-values-colo-2.0.0.0-cms20120703113236/lib ; /opt/oix/server/manager/default-values-colo-2.0.0.0-cms20120703113236/bin/ConfigureUserChunks.pl check --chunks-count=10 --target-hosts='HostName1,' --chunks-root='/opt/oix/server/var/cache/Users1/' --transport='ssh:/home/aduser/.ssh/adkey' --check-hosts='HostName1,' --xml-out=/tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% HostName4:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% HostName5:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% HostName6:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% HostName1:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% HostName13:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% HostName14:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml || ( EX=$? ; if [ $EX -eq 1 ] ; then eval 'echo -e %%SMS_COLOR_ERROR%%redistribution required%%SMS_COLOR_PLAIN%%' && exit 1 ; else exit -1 ; fi ; )

Service.name: fe1-UserInfoDistributor
Service.start_cmd: export PERL5LIB=$PERL5LIB:/opt/foros/server/manager/default-values-colo-2.0.0.0-cms20120703113236/lib ; /opt/oix/server/manager/default-values-colo-2.0.0.0-cms20120703113236/bin/ConfigureUserChunks.pl reconf --chunks-count=10 --target-hosts='HostName1,' --chunks-root='/opt/oix/server/var/cache/Users1/' --transport='ssh:/home/aduser/.ssh/adkey' --check-hosts='HostName1,' --force=%%force%% --check-hosts=%%check-hosts%%

Service.name: troubleshoot-TReport
Service.start_cmd: %%cmd%% ssh -o "BatchMode yes" -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey %%HOST%% " PATH=$PATH:/opt/foros/server/bin; ERROR_LOG=$ERROR_LOG; /opt/oix/server/bin/TReport.pl -w /opt/oix/server/var -c /opt/oix/server/etc -b /opt/oix/server -m default-values-colo -o /opt/oix/server/var/tr_report_HostName1_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz" 2>>$ERROR_LOG || echo "Error occured on generating report for host HostName1. Exit status = $?." >>$ERROR_LOG

Service.name: troubleshoot-Fetcher
Service.start_cmd: %%cmd%% scp -q -o "BatchMode yes" -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey %%HOST%%:/opt/foros/server/var/tr_report_HostName1_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz $treport_dir 2>>$ERROR_LOG || echo "Error occured on getting report from HostName1. Exit status = $?." >>$ERROR_LOG

Service.name: troubleshoot-Cleaner
Service.start_cmd: %%cmd%% ssh -o "BatchMode yes" -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey %%HOST%% rm -f /opt/foros/server/var/tr_report_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz 2>/dev/null; return 0

Service.name: clear-stat-backup-ClearLogBackup
Service.start_cmd: %%cmd%% ssh -o "BatchMode yes" -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey %%HOST%% find /opt/foros/server/var/log -wholename "*/*/Out/*_/*.*" -exec "rm '{}' \;"

Service.name: troubleshoot-Fetcher
Service.start_cmd: %%cmd%% scp -q -o "BatchMode yes" -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey %%HOST%%:/opt/foros/server/var/tr_report_HostName16_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz $treport_dir 2>>$ERROR_LOG || echo "Error occured on getting report from HostName16. Exit status = $?." >>$ERROR_LOG

Service.name: troubleshoot-Cleaner
Service.start_cmd: %%cmd%% ssh -o "BatchMode yes" -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey %%HOST%% rm -f /opt/foros/server/var/tr_report_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz 2>/dev/null; return 0

Service.name: clear-stat-backup-ClearLogBackup
Service.start_cmd: %%cmd%% ssh -o "BatchMode yes" -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey %%HOST%% find /opt/foros/server/var/log -wholename "*/*/Out/*_/*.*" -exec "rm '{}' \;"

Service.start_cmd: %%cmd%% tar --ignore-failed-read -cf $REPORTFILE --remove-files -C $treport_dir tr_report_HostName1_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName2_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName3_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName4_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName5_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName6_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName7_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName8_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName9_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName10_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName11_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName12_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName13_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName14_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName15_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName16_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName17_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName18_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName19_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName20_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName21_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName22_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName23_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz tr_report_HostName24_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%.tar.gz error_description_%%SMS_UNIQUE%%; return 0
